conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: I hear your plea, soul of the forest.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: Thank you, kindred spirit. To bring back the colors, seek the Forgotten Flower at the Blinking Hallow. Its petals hold the essence of the spectrum, and with it, you can paint life back into this world.

conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: I shall find the Forgotten Flower and fulfill my destiny. I won't let darkness consume this place any longer.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: Go forth, brave one, and may the magic within you guide your path. The fate of the enchanted realm rests upon your shoulders.
